thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Airline Ticket Centre.ca reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Carrie was helpful and knowledgeable about the resort we were booking. She was determined to give us the best price possible and cant wait to go on our trip knowing it is great value. We have been using Airline Ticket Centre for years and keep coming back for the great service and deals.
